ai-patthana8.74:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.74:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for refuge.
ai-patthana8.74:2.1_0: Nor causes and conditions dependent on the thought.
ai-patthana8.74:3.1_0: Nor is a cause and reason for each other. ...
ai-patthana8.74:4.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
